Reviews.Title: “Istanbul wonderful City”
Reviews.Author: COS_10
Reviews.Content: hotel located istanbuls city centre 2 km district sultanahmet covered rooftop restaurant offering panoramic views simply furnished equipped air main attractions accessible 30 minutes walking include beyazit mosque grand bazaar tram 10minute walk

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable Hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: Mazzer72
Reviews.Content: location hotel reasonable 510 mins walk tram station service clean tidy averse noise hotel noisy appears heavy vehicles travelling past beyond midnight staff helpful friendly breakfast fair

HotelInfo.Name: Fuar Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Namik Kemal Caddesi 26, Istanbul 34300, Turkey
